problems.title: Palindrome Partitioning
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a string s, partition s such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome.
Return all possible palindrome partitioning of s.

Backtracking Approach:
Try to cut the string at every possible position. If the prefix is a palindrome, recurse on the suffix.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
aab

Sample Output
a,a,b aa,b

Explanation:
"a", "a", "b" are all palindromes.
"aa", "b" are all palindromes.
hintsList: Iterate i from 1 to length. If s[0:i] is palindrome, recurse on s[i:].
